content.rendered:
Written by Simon Cowell.

Cast Heidi Klum (Self – Judge). Simon Cowell (Self – Judge). Terry Crews (Self – Host). Kodi Lee (Self – Contestant). Dre DiMura (Musician). Aidan Bryant (Self). Aneeshwar Kunchala (Red Carpet Host). Jackie Fabulous (Self). Avery Dixon (Self). Adam Lambert (Self). Mike E. Winfield (Self). Terry Fator (Self). Alan Silva (Self). Sethward (Sethward the Goat). Meghane Lex (Self – Audience member). Tom Ball (Self – Contestant). Bello Sisters (Self). Caly Bevier (Self – Contestant). Dustin Tavella (Self). Divyansh & Manuraj (Self). Berywam (Self – Contestant). Jimmie Herrod (Self). Bir Khalsa (Self). Keiichi Iwasaki (Self). Sara James (Self). Dustin’s Dojo (Self).Keren Montero . Peter Antoniou (Self). Viviana Rossi (Self). Light Balance Kids (Self). Captain Ruin (Self). Dance Town Family (Self). Lioz (Self). Madeleine Lemay (Audience unknow)

Language English.

Producers Dan Bowen. Alevil Rincones. Kristal Williams. James Zukor. Kazuyuki Agawa. Benjamin/Ep Walker Baldwin. Eric Zambrowicz. Natasha Brugler. Alison Rodriguez. Simon Cowell. Sam Donnelly. Jason Raff. Series Film Editing by. Kevin Blum. Will Simpson.

Production Fremantle. NBC. Syco Entertainment.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2023–)
